subject: Appeals Courts (US)
Football
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court rejected an N.F.L. request to reconsider its decision in a labor case involving two Minnesota players accused of violating the league’s antidoping policy.
snippet: A federal appeals court rejected an N.F.L. request to reconsider its decision in a labor case involving two Minnesota players accused of violating the league’s antidoping policy.
